text: Purola (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is one of the 70 assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand a northern state of India. Purola is part of Tehri Garhwal Lok Sabha constituency. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== Key {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Winner!!Party |} ==See also== * Tehri Garhwal (Lok Sabha constituency) ==References== * http://eci.nic.in/eci_main/CurrentElections/CONSOLIDATED_ORDER%20_ECI%20.pdf * http://ceo.uk.gov.in/files/Election2012/RESULTS_2012_Uttarakhand_State.pdf * http://www.elections.in/uttarakhand/assembly-constituencies/purola.html Category:Uttarkashi Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand Category:2002 establishments in India Category:Constituencies established in 2002
title: Purola (Uttarakhand Assembly constituency)
